org.apache.mesos.scheduler.recovery

Class FailureUtils

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.mesos.scheduler.recovery.FailureUtils

  • public class FailureUtils
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides utility methods for the handling of failed Tasks.

    • Method Detail

      • isLabeledAsFailed

        public static boolean isLabeledAsFailed(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Check if a Task has been marked as permanently failed.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - The Task to check for failure.
        Returns:
        True if the Task has been marked, false otherwise.

      • markFailed

        public static Protos.TaskInfo markFailed(Protos.TaskInfo taskInfo)
        Mark a task as permanently failed. This new marked Task should be persistently stored.
        Parameters:
        taskInfo - The Task to be marked.
        Returns:
        The marked TaskInfo which may be a copy of the original TaskInfo.
